message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product, which I believe will be incredibly valuable for your business. My starting price is $1,000,000. I'm confident we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer and the value of the product. However, considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $850,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $850,000 is significantly below the value this product holds for both of us. To bridge the gap, I'm willing to come down to $950,000. This price reflects a fair compromise and allows us to close this deal.
